name: Cheil
description:
Based in the heart of Bankside’s growing creative community, Cheil London offers a unique approach to how brands connect with consumers and overcome business challenges. We build campaigns. Shops. Robots. One-of-a-kind experiences. Anything that will help transport people, brands and products. Our approach, rooted in digital innovations has seen us partnering with the likes of Absolut, Coca-Cola, Samsung and Jaguar Land Rover, creating enduring ideas for any market – and within any medium.
As part of Cheil Worldwide, Cheil London plays its part in one of the world’s biggest agency networks. Working alongside global counterparts and eight specialist affiliates including Iris, BMB, McKinney and The Barbarian Group.
READ MORE...
